title: [Full USER Name] wants to join {{domainName}} payspace.
approvalRequestDetails: {{userName}} ({{ email }}) has requested to join your {{ domainName }} payspace.
approvalRequestForAdmin: You are receiving this mail because you are an admin of the {{ domainName }} payspace.
approvalRequestManage: You can manage your payspaces member requests from the dashboard. To deny this request, simply ignore this email.
